page.title: 05**SHOPPING IN PRESTATYN**
page.content: If you are coming to{Prestatyn}to shop then the best places to go to are the {High St.,Meliden Rd.}&{Nant Hall Rd. If you want to park near the{High St. then there is ample space for people to park.If you come by bus or train then the shops are easily accessible from the{stations.Prestatyn}has a variety of shops.Prestatyn has a lot of{clothes}shops and there are also 4 jewellers.We have a Market by the {Railway station}which is open every {Tuesday}&{Friday.}In the Market there are numerous stalls with{food,clothes, {bedding,footwear and handbags.The High {St.}has changed over the last few months.The road has been{resurfaced and we have had{improved}pavements put down.The new pavements are brick and decorative concrete slabs instead of plain slabs.They are much better because you don't trip over them.
